unnormalised: My grandma, Meenakshi Amma, always swore by Ayurveda. Remember how she used to travel to Kottakkal for her treatments? Her knee pain vanished! She'd say, "Modern medicine helps, beta, but Ayurveda heals." Makes me think of her every Onam when we make the sadhya. Maybe I should book a panchakarma retreat near Rishikesh. Heard good things about it. Need to look into the costs though, maybe around Rs. 10,000? Heard they have 10 km walks.
